About me

Hi, I'm Robin, a young web developer. I made this website for fun during my freetime. So please be gentle about it, I know that it's far from being perfect. But if you still like it despite its defaults, you make me a happy man.

About mooderize

  • Mooderize is open source, the sources are on github. Feel free to copy anything for your own project.
  • Mooderize uses Web Audio API. So the audio processing is done on your own machine. It means that the better your computer or smartphone is, the faster the loading will be.

About Privacy

The uploaded files don't leave your computer. Only YouTube links are sent to an external server, but I promise that I won't look at it! The website doesn't even use cookie lmao.
